jobDescription: RESPONSIBILITIES:Kforce has a client that is seeking a Senior Data Scientist Manager in Secaucus, New Jersey (NJ). Summary: This is a full-time/permanent role with a Fortune 500 company located in Secaucus, New Jersey (NJ). They are rapidly expanding their management team and are looking for candidates with strong experience in Data Science to manager their Data Science group. Strong understanding of Machine Learning and Statistical Modeling needed as well as strong experience with advanced data extraction and applicable tools (such as Spark/Python/SQL).REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor's degree Previous management experience preferred Strong experience with Machine Learning and Statistical Modeling concepts Understanding of applicable data science coding and tools (such as Spark, SQL, and Python) Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
